column1: Regular traffic reports will resume Thursday March 25 at 4:00 p.m.

column3: UPDATE:  TRAFFIC ALERT FOR S LIMESTONE:
column4: S Limestone is now OPEN between Cooper Dr and Waller Ave.

column3: UPDATE:  TRAFFIC ALERT FOR S LIMESTONE:
column4: The roadway had been closed for several hours due to a Police incident.

column3: Traffic Alert - Richmond Rd at Squires Rd/Yorkshire Blvd:
column4: Traffic impact due to damaged and low hanging traffic signals.
column5: The left lanes are blocked in both directions until further notice due to low hanging traffic signals.

column3: Traffic Alert - Richmond Rd at Squires Rd/Yorkshire Blvd:
column4: The outbound left lane is blocked.

column3: Traffic Alert - Richmond Rd at Squires Rd/Yorkshire Blvd:
column4: Both inbound lanes are blocked.  Traffic diverted to the right turn lane.
